data.scheme_name: Karnataka Tourism Policy 2020-26 - Reimbursement of Land Conversion Fee - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides 100% reimbursement payment of land conversion fee.
data.eligibility: Entities with specified Tourism Projects registered with the Department of Tourism are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
The land conversion order must be in the name of the Applicant. 
There shall be no reimbursement on land conversion fee for conversion of land located within the jurisdiction of the Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) and Bengaluru Metropolitan Region Development Authority (BMRDA).
data.beneficiaries: Entities with specified Tourism Projects registered with the Department of Tourism are eligible under the scheme
data.prerequisites:
The land conversion order must be in the name of the Applicant. Reimbursement of land conversion fee shall be applicable only for the extent of land utilized for fixed assets for the purposes of developing the tourism project. 

The decision of the District Tourism Committee shall be final in this regard. 

There shall be no reimbursement on land conversion fee for conversion of land located within the jurisdiction of the Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) and Bengaluru Metropolitan Region Development Authority (BMRDA).
data.nodal_agency: Department of Tourism, Government of Karnataka
data.context: To provide a framework for Karnataka’s tourism industry to overcome ongoing difficulties, adapt to new norms, and remain competitive in the global tourism landscape.
data.objective: Karnataka aims to boost tourism for economic growth and employment, ensure visitor safety and comfort, promote globally, enhance infrastructure, attract private investments, and pursue sustainable development aligned with UN goals.
data.description: Scheme provides 100% reimbursement payment of land conversion fee for converting the land from agricultural use to non-agricultural use for the development of New Tourism Projects.
data.how_to_apply:
The applicant can apply through the below link:
https://tourismpolicy.karnataka.gov.in/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get incentive after the approval of the application by the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
New Tourism Projects and Expansion Tourism Projects for only the following Eligible Tourism Projects shall be eligible –
1. Adventure Tourism Project
2. Agri Tourism Project
3. Amusement Park
4. Caravan Park Project
5. Caravan Tourism Project
6. Convention Centre
7. Cultural Tourism Project
8. Cultural Village
9. Eco Tourism Project
10. Heritage Hotel
11. Heritage Tourism Project
12. Heritage Walk
13. Homestay
14. Hotel Project-Budget
15. Hotel Project-Premium
16. 16 Houseboat Project
17. 17 Museum and Galleries
18. Ropeway
19. Safety and Hygiene Tourism Project
20. Sound & Light Show
21. Tented Accommodation
22. Theme Park
23. Tourist Interpretation Centre
24. Tourist Luxury Coach
25. Wellness Centre
26. Wayside Amenities
data.checklist_info_a:
Business registration documents, financial statements, project proposals:-
Form for General Details of the Applicant 
Declaration by Applicant
Application Form for In-Principle Approval for Tourism Project
Application Form for Extension of In-Principle Approval for Tourism Project
Application Form for Amendment of In-Principle Approval due to Modification in Project Plan for Tourism Project
Application Form for Final Approval of Capital Investment Subsidy for Tourism Project
Application Form for Final Approval of Interest Subsidy for Tourism Project
Application Form for Disbursal of Interest Subsidy for Tourism Project
Sanction Order for In-Principle Approval for Eligible Tourism Project
Sanction Order for Extension of In-Principle Approval for Eligible Tourism Project
Sanction Order for Amendment of In-Principle Approval due to Modification in Project Plan for Tourism Project
Sanction Order for Final Approval of Capital Investment Subsidy for Eligible Tourism Project
Sanction Order for Final Approval of Interest Subsidy for Eligible Tourism Project
CA Certificate for New Tourism Project
CA Certificate for Expansion Tourism Project
CA Certificate for Purchase Vehicle / Aircraft / Watercraft for Tourism Activities
Certificate from Chartered Engineer / Valuer for Project Cost for Tourism Project
Certificate from Bank / Financial Institution for Fixed Investment for Tourism Project
Certificate from Bank / Financial Institution for Payment of Loan Instalment along with Interest 
Annexure 1 Verification Documents to be Submitted for various types of Applicant:-
Sole Proprietorship-
i. Registration certificate
ii. Certificate / License issued by Municipal Authorities under Shop and Establishment Act
iii. GST registration certificate of Proprietorship
iv. PAN of the Proprietor
Partnership Firm- 
i. Registration Certificate
ii. Partnership Deed
iii. PAN of the Partnership Firm
iv. GST registration certificate of Partnership Firm
v. Power of Attorney authorizing the individual submitting the application
Limited Liability Partnership (LLP)-
i. Certificate of Incorporation 
ii. Copy of LLP Agreement
iii. PAN of LLP
iv. GST registration certificate of LLP
v. Power of Attorney authorizing the individual submitting the application
Company (Private Limited or Public Limited)-
i. Certificate of Incorporation
ii. Memorandum & Articles of Association
iii. PAN of Company
iv. GST registration certificate of Company
v. Power of Attorney / Board Resolution authorizing the individual submitting the application
Trust / Association / Club / Society-
i. Copy of registration certificate with competent authority in India
ii. Declaration of Trust / Bye law of Trust / Association / Club / Society, as applicable
iii. PAN of Trust / Association / Club / Society, as applicable
iv. GST registration certificate of Trust / Association / Club / Society, as applicable
v. Power of Attorney authorizing the individual submitting the application
Hindu Undivided Family (HUF)-
i PAN of HUF
ii. Deed of declaration of HUF
iii. Identity proof of Karta / Existing authorized signatories
iv. GST registration certificate of HUF
Annexure 2 Structure of Project Report

Contact: 080-2235 2828
